section_tags.name: [VERSE]
section_tags.description: Marks the verse section of a song, typically containing the main story or narrative.
section_tags.example: [VERSE] Walking through the neon streets, memories flood back...

section_tags.name: [CHORUS]
section_tags.description: Marks the chorus section, which is the most memorable and repeated part of the song.
section_tags.example: [CHORUS] Never forget where we started, always remember who we are...

section_tags.name: [INTRO]
section_tags.description: Marks the introduction section of the song, setting the mood and tone.

section_tags.name: [OUTRO]
section_tags.description: Marks the final section of the song, often bringing closure.
section_tags.example: [OUTRO] As the lights dim and the crowd fades away...

section_tags.name: [BRIDGE]
section_tags.description: Marks a contrasting section that typically appears after the second chorus.
section_tags.example: [BRIDGE] Breaking through the walls I've built around my heart...

section_tags.name: [PRE-CHORUS]
section_tags.description: Marks a section that builds tension before transitioning into the chorus.
section_tags.example: [PRE-CHORUS] The pressure builds with every breath I take...

section_tags.name: [HOOK]
section_tags.description: Marks a catchy, repeatable section designed to 'hook' the listener.
section_tags.example: [HOOK] Live fast, dream big, never look back!

section_tags.name: [INSTRUMENTAL]
section_tags.description: Marks a section without lyrics, showcasing the instrumental elements.

meta_tags.name: [INSTRUMENTS]
meta_tags.description: Specifies instruments to include in the arrangement.
meta_tags.example: [INSTRUMENTS] Piano, strings, electronic drums, bass synth

meta_tags.name: [AVOID]
meta_tags.description: Specifies instruments or elements to exclude from the arrangement.

meta_tags.name: [FEELING]
meta_tags.description: Sets the emotional tone of the composition.

meta_tags.name: [GENRE]
meta_tags.description: Defines the musical style or genre.

meta_tags.name: [SUBJECT]
meta_tags.description: Sets the lyrical theme or subject matter.
meta_tags.example: [SUBJECT] Digital connection in an increasingly isolated world

instrument_tags.name: [VOICE]
instrument_tags.example: [VOICE] Male, low range, emotional and slightly raspy

instrument_tags.name: [GUITAR]
instrument_tags.example: [GUITAR] Clean electric with delay and reverb, arpeggiated patterns

instrument_tags.name: [PERCUSSION]
instrument_tags.example: [PERCUSSION] Minimal electronic kit with glitch elements and deep kick

instrument_tags.name: [BASS]
instrument_tags.example: [BASS] Deep sub bass with occasional mid-range fills

instrument_tags.name: [KEYBOARDS]
instrument_tags.description: Specifies keyboard or synth style or direction.
instrument_tags.example: [KEYBOARDS] Atmospheric pads with subtle modulation and bright leads
